page.title: 17IMPORTANCE OF MEDIA - EGMERE
page.content: The population of this area being very scattered, the{media}assumes a great significance in most people's lives. Every household purchases at least one newspaper daily. The two local papers, the{Eastern Daily Press}and the {Dereham and Fakenham Times}(weekly), are very popular. They are read thoroughly. The local weekly free trading paper is appreciated. Most take a{national newspaper}of the popular kind (e.g. Sun, Star, Mirror). Most households take magazines including several women's magazines and some specialised interest ones (e.g. Farmers' Weekly). All but one family owned{radios}and used them regularly - especially in the morning to hear the News.{T.V.}sets of equal number were used for longer periods. Six homes had often-used{video {recorders.
